nodes.text: Droids by Janice was a small droid shop located in the Upper City of Taris during the time of the Jedi Civil War. It was owned by the Twi'lek Janice Nall, who—although skilled—had few customers due to her species. She also sold droid upgrades and parts here. Revan and Carth Onasi came by the shop to acquire the upgraded utility droid T3-M4, who had the slicing skill to crack the security system at the Sith military base.
